Text: Windows 8 will be released in October 2012. This only a preview version that was released feb 29th. It does not have full functionality. Win 8 will be a touch screen OS, not sure if it will work for Ordinary Laptops and PC's...Lets hope!

Let's hope NOT! Looks like the second coming av Windows Vista where majority of people will just won't care!

Who in their right minds will install an OS who is totaly based(and has a lot of code) on and for touch screens?? 

How many people will actualy run and buy a 24 inch touch screen?? Someone in microsoft has put his head up his ass again!
